messages.title: Dear Resident,
messages.content: This General Election gives you an opportunity to vote in a young, fresh, energetic MP in Worthing West. Much is under threat if the Conservatives win...

keyPolicies.policyDescription: Worried about the Conservatives who say they will scrap the two new hospitals...
Cut inheritance tax for the richest 3000 estates? Scrap 50% income tax for those earning over Â£150,000?

leaflet.personalStatement: As a young enthusiastic candidate aged 24, I find it extremely rewarding helping local people to resolve their problems; that's why I'm in politics.

contactInformation.address: Ian Ross, Labour Hall, Lyndhurst Road, Worthing, BN11 2DF

images.caption: Ian Ross with a background of greenery.
